pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Ramadan does what perhaps might normally take weeks to organize, that is gather families for a meal. It is custom to sit together for the sunset meal as a family when breaking your fast, and it gives the family an opportunity to catch up with each other's news and enjoy each other, to connect with each other.


 It's a moment for spiritually uplifting.

Ramadan Competition!  üåô 

Head over to Fazoora tab and answer the question of the day . Results are going to be calculated by the end of the month and you are the lucky winner . You are going get huge prize. Stay tuned for more fun stuff to come !

Ramadan decorations in CAIRO


In Islamic history, you find that Egyptians are the first to invent the idea of the ‚ÄúRamadan Lantern‚Äù where it dates back to the era of the Fatimid state to then move from Egypt to all countries of the world. The Fatimid caliph used to go out on the night before Ramadan along with children, each of them carrying a lantern to light the way as they sang in celebration for the holy month. In another story, one of the Fatimid caliphs ordered the lighting of mosques throughout the month of Ramadan with lanterns and candles.


Opinions may be conflicting, but everyone agrees that this tradition dates back at least several centuries. Certainly, it developed through the ages, and manifests itself in different forms, but we hope it retains its authenticity and remains a source of joy to our hearts.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Nutrition Facts

Per Serving:

630 calories; protein 26.5g 53% DV; carbohydrates 55g 18% DV; fat 33.6g 52% DV; cholesterol 99.6mg 33% DV; sodium 777mg 31% DV.

Preparation

  1. In a large pot, bring the milk to a boil.
  2. Add the pasta and stir constantly until the pasta is cooked, about 10 minutes.
  3. Turn off the heat, then add the cheddar. Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is evenly coated.
  4. Enjoy!

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Ramadan Quiz

Every day we are going to post a new question . By End of Ramadan we are going to announce the winner.


1st Place will get 5000 Egyptian Pounds.

2nd Place will get two days vacation to Maldives.

Third Place will get free two cinema tickets.

Rules of the Quiz


Every employee has only one chance to submit his answer. 

Every day you will get a new question.

Do you have a charity project and looking for volunteers ? Share it now on Ramadan Wall

Do you want to share some tips regarding Ramadan ? Share it now on Ramadan Wall

Did you cook a delicious dish yesterday and want to share the recipe ? Share it now Ramadan Wall
